text: Andrew Cuomo reacted to Trump's intention to deploy military personnel if civil unrest continues over the death of George Floyd by accusing the president of "calling out the American military for a photo opportunity." https://t.co/WAJqIgVvE0

name: axios
text: Protests over the death of George Floyd and other police-related killings of black people continued for a seventh across the U.S., with President Trump threatening to deploy the military if the unrest continues. Here's what else is happening https://t.co/7QYLUKoUaQ

name: axios
text:
